model

Class DataStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DataStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Viewable

    public class DataStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Viewable
    The DataStorage class holds the lists of publications, research groups, academic staff, and research students, and a reference to the system administrator. As well a list registered views, which it notifies when changes are made.
